title: (x) "The Philosophy of Andy Warhol" book cover - ITC Serif Gothic {Brandon Schoe}
content:
From the first (?) edition of "The Philosophy of Andy Warhol (From A to B & Back Again)," here's the sample:  
 [http://991.com/newGallery/Andy-Warhol-The-Philosophy-Of-397133.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022080053/http:/991.com/newGallery/Andy-Warhol-The-Philosophy-Of-397133.jpg "http://991.com/newGallery/Andy-Warhol-The-Philosophy-Of-397133.jpg")  
To clarify, it's the title font I'm looking for, not the one in the small red box.

Thanks in advance!
author: Pico

comments.content: Whoa, what a quick answer! Thank you! :)
